item.description:
3-8PM • Unitarian Universalist Fellowship Hall • 7 Elm Street, Harvard, MA

YOGA • HEALING • INSPIRATION • MUSIC • FOOD

Tickets are limited!  For Sales & info visit www.beingthechange.us

Special Presentation by Dr. Will Tuttle, author of the "World Peace Diet". If you wonder how the food you eat affects your health and well-being and that of those you care about, you shouldn't miss this lecture. You will learn how we have become disconnected from nature and how to make positive changes that promote health, encourage compassion, and minimize our eco-footprints on the Earth.
www.worldpeacediet.com

Musician and Bhakti poet, Tom Lena (Tamal Krishna das) offers "Songs of Peace" with The Bhakti Friends, inspiring others with the sacred sounds of vocal chanting and singing. Tom's fluid and inspiring tunes help open our hearts so that we may wake up our souls and flow into grace.
www.tomlenamusic.com

Through the beautiful sounds of alchemy crystal singing bowls, antique Tibetan and Indian singing bowls, planetary gong and other harmonious instruments; Bindy Johnson leads you on a soul journey where the gifts are as endless and abundant as we desire them to be.
www.bindy.org

"If you can breathe, you can do this yoga." john Calabria will lead participants through a series of gentle postures bringing on mindfulness and peace. Balancing mind, body and spirit, facilitating a feeling of wholeness and connectedness.
www.yogawithjohn.com

Chris Belanger, is a certified Laughter Yoga Leader, Through fun and unique interactive sessions, Chris shares the healing and energizing power of Laughter - throughout southern New England. www.laughteryogari.com.

A delicious complimentary plant-based meal will be offered with a selection of locally grown and organic produce. There will be options for varied tastes.

proceeds to benefit
  Maple Farm Sanctuary                               Food Not Bombs
item.name: BEING THE CHANGE - WORLD PEACE CONFERENCE
